data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

The person facing forward takes 10 steps forward then carries on walking in that direction. The person facing left then takes 9 steps of the same direction. The person facing right then takes 10 steps of the same direction. The person facing left then takes 2 steps forward and then moves until he gets to the starting point. Thus, the answer is No.
